${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Private Optical Network – Build or buy? Your enterprise can benefit from its own secure private optical network today! What is the right networking infrastructure for you?
Optical networking is the way to go, but do you buy network services from a communications service provider, or build your own private network? The answer may surprise you!
Building a private optical network is best for enterprises that:
- Prefer more control of their networking needs - Want to increase capacity and achieve faster response times - Need to secure the data that flows over the network
Learn more by watching the Nokia and LightRiver webinar series <[[http://lightriver.nokia.pages.services/lightriver-nokia-campaign]]> where this week we feature key business case elements to consider for building vs buying, and the benefits.
